price: 225. Zie je dan niet dat zij in iedere vallei over ieder onderwerp spreken in hun gedichten? –
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
